name: Ostia, from the allure of thirties to the years of lead
description: Discover the seaside of the Eternal City, dip your toes into its dark sand and promenade along its seafront and its pier. Walk through a suburb built in the Thirties and appreciate the architecture of that time, then find out the role Ostia played in the Seventies. But don't forget to enjoy some shopping, go local and take with you memories from this corner of  Rome.
